name: OmniGear
description:
Customize your mech and battle it out in this multiplayer brawler.

OST Jam

This game was originally submitted to the OST Jam Vol 6. A jam where the community creates an album, and you create a game inspired by music from it. This jam's theme was "Vintage".

Music By:

Milau - Vintage

HaruMKT - Starlight

Controls:

Controller Recommended

Joystick (Xbox, PlayStation, Switch supported)Keyboard & MouseLeft Stick - Move
Right Stick - Aim
A - Jump
RT - Arms / Primary Attack
LT - Accessory / Secondary Attack
RB - Body / Defense
LB - Body / SpecialWASD - Move
Space - Jump
Q - Arms / Primary Attack
E - Accessory / Secondary Attack
C - Body / Defense
Z - Body / Special

This game is still a work in progress, more modes, parts, and stages are planned and in the works!
